hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT ESCP_ID, ESCP_ESST_CODE, ESCP_CODE, ESCP_NAME, ESCP_VALUE, ESCP_DESC, ORG_ID, REC_VER, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFIER, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR, REC_STATUS, COMPANY_CODE, SITE_CODE FROM ES_CUSTOMER_PARAM WHERE 1=1 <<AND ESCP_ID LIKE :escpId>> <<AND ESCP_ESST_CODE LIKE :escpEsstCode>> <<AND ESCP_ESST_CODE in (:escpEsstCodes)>> <<AND ESCP_CODE LIKE :escpCode>> <<AND ESCP_NAME LIKE :escpName>> <<AND ESCP_VALUE LIKE :escpValue>> <<AND ESCP_DESC LIKE :escpDesc>> <<AND ORG_ID LIKE :orgId>> <<AND REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND COMPANY_CODE LIKE :companyCode>> <<AND SITE_CODE LIKE :siteCode>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
